events.name: Google Cloud Study Jam Online
events.description:
Cloud Study Jamâ€‹ Online is an â€‹on-line â€‹hands-on training event based on â€‹Qwiklabs ( https://www.qwiklabs.com/ )â€‹. Along two days, ina â€‹2 hours session eachday, participants will complete aseries of labs, covering one or severalâ€‹ Google Cloud Platform ( https://cloud.google.com/ ) topics related to Kubernetes. Evenmore, using Google Classroomâ€‹, theparticipants will get follow-up support allowing them to extend the training to one month.

EVENT'S DETAILS

ğŸ“†Date:
Nov 6th, 17:00 - 19:00
Nov 7th, 17:00 - 19:00

ğŸ“ Location:
On line

ğŸ—“ï¸ Calendar event:
Use this link --> https://bit.ly/2BQP0OY

ğŸ”— Live Streaming session:
Use this link --> https://bit.ly/2Prg534

ğŸ‘¨â€âœˆï¸ Trainer:
Almo, Google DevRel

ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§â€ğŸ‘¦ Audience:
Developer, with no or little experience in Google Cloud Platform, willing to improve their skills Kubernetes and infrastructure development.

ğŸ“– Contents:
In terms of contents, Cloud Study Jam offers high level of customization. In particular we could cover one or more topics, adjusting the level of expertise necessary.

ğŸ’Pre-Work:
Using your gmail account

Sign up Classroom --> https://classroom.google.com/h
and join to the class-id qkjgda

Sign up Qwiklabs --> https://www.qwiklabs.com/
Do the lab â€œA Tour of Qwiklabs and the Google Cloud Platformâ€ ( https://www.qwiklabs.com/focuses/2794?parent=catalog )

ğŸ¢Infrastructure:
Getting Started with Cloud Shell & gcloud --> https://www.qwiklabs.com/focuses/563?parent=catalog

Creating a Virtual Machine --> https://www.qwiklabs.com/focuses/3563?parent=catalog

Orchestrating the Cloud with Kubernetes --> https://www.qwiklabs.com/focuses/557?parent=catalog

Continuous Delivery Pipelines with Spinnaker and Kubernetes Engine --> https://www.qwiklabs.com/focuses/552?parent=catalog

Additionally, introducing a section Next Steps, it is possible to forward those profile more senior to advanced topics.

TRAINER INFO

ğŸ‘¨ğŸ»â€ğŸ«Bio:
Andres-Leonardo Martinez-Ortiz a.k.a almo is a member of the Google Engineering team, leading Google Cloud Ecosystem program in Europe. Based in Zurich, he drives the success of Google's developer products and the Open Web by creating a thriving ecosystem of developers. He meets with experts and partners in large companies, startups, universities and enterprises, promoting Open standards and Google technologies. He is also a member of IEEE, ACM, Linux Foundation and Computer Society.

@davilagrau

FAQ

â–¶ï¸ Is this a lecture about Google Cloud?
No it is not. This is a hands-on event. Donâ€™t expect to have presentations or lectures about the topics covered. But no need to worry! All the labs are self-contained and you will get content about the topics of the session before the training.

â–¶ï¸ Is this a Q&A session? Will I get support about my projects?
No it is not. You wonâ€™t get support either. However, we will gather your questions, doing our best to get them solved.

â–¶ï¸ Will I get access to Qwiklab after the event?
Yes, you will. The event offers one-month free subscription to Qwiklab. You can extend this free offer one additional month completing any of the quest available.

events.name: Community Speedrun Challenge #1
events.description:
Hola comunidad!

El Community Speedrun Challenge es un programa de formaciÃ³n que se harÃ¡ durante el mes de mayo, donde tendrÃ¡s la oportunidad de unirte a 4 Speedruns y obtener experiencia prÃ¡ctica sobre Machine Learning en Google Cloud y Tensorflow, y dar tus primeros pasos con herramientas como BigQuery, Cloud Speech API y Cloud ML Engine, ganando puntos para ganar premios.

Cada Speedrun comienza con un seminario web organizado por un experto de Google en horario de [masked] horario de EspaÃ±a) para que te familiarices con el tema. DespuÃ©s del seminario web tienes una semana para completar todos los talleres de la competiciÃ³n tan rÃ¡pido como puedas (puedes probar cada taller hasta cinco veces).

En este primer webinar de la serie aprenderemos nociones bÃ¡sicas sobre BigQuery, la API de Cloud Speech y Cloud ML Engine.

# INSCRIPCIÃ“N

RegÃ­strate en los Speedruns que te interesen en la siguiente URL:

https://bit.ly/SpeedrunM19

IMPORTANTE: Necesario indicar que has oÃ­do hablar de los Speedrun en la opciÃ³n "Community Event (e.g. Meetup.com)" y escribir GDGMarbella.

El ponente en esta ocasiÃ³n serÃ¡, Zack Akil https://www.linkedin.com/in/zackakil
Machine Learning Developer Advocate at Google.

En este primer Speedrun aprenderÃ¡s a:

>>Entrenar e implementar un modelo de TensorFlow en AI Platform con el propÃ³sito de deriva (predicciÃ³n).

>>Explorar datos visualmente, limpiarlos y prepararlos para su anÃ¡lisis mediante el servicio de Google Cloud Dataprep.

>>Crear un streaming pipeline mediante una plantilla de Cloud Dataflow

>>Utilizar el SDK de Cloud Dataflow para Python.

>>Crear un clÃºster de Google Cloud Dataproc

>>Aprender sobre las APIs de Cloud Natural Lenguage y Google Cloud Speech.

>>Extraer metadatos de Video Intelligence mediante Google Cloud Intelligence.

>>Aprender sobre Reinforcement Learning.
---
Hello!

Weâ€™re sure most of you are interested in learning new technologies and tools. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™re excited to participate in the Community Speedrun Challenge that Google is organizing for developer communities in Europe. And as part of the GDGMarbella, youâ€™re among the first to know about this!!

The Community Speedrun Challenge is a training program that will run in May where youâ€™ll have the opportunity to join four Speedruns and get hands-on experience with Machine Learning on Google Cloud, and take your first steps with tools like BigQuery, Cloud Speech API, and Cloud ML Engine. Every Speedrun is open for a week to give you the ability to finish all labs in your best time, scoring more points and winning prizes.

Find more information and register here: bit.ly/speedrunchallengeeurope

Schedule:
Speedrun Start Date: May 4
Webinar Time: Mondays from 7pm to 9pm (GMT+2)
Topics

Baseline: Data, ML, AI with Zack Akil (Google)

events.name: SpeedRun #2  IntroducciÃ³n a ML

DespuÃ©s del seminario web tienes una semana para completar todos los laboratorios de la competiciÃ³n tan rÃ¡pido como puedas (puedes probar cada laboratorio hasta cinco veces).

Con una gran cantidad de APIs, GCP cuenta con una herramienta para casi cualquier trabajo de Machine Learning asÃ­ que, en este segundo webinar de la serie, aprenderemos cÃ³mo extraer entidades de un texto y realizar anÃ¡lisis sintÃ¡cticos y de sentimientos, asÃ­ como utilizar la API de Speech to Text para la transcripciÃ³n.

Dale Markowitz, Software Engineer at Google Research (https://www.linkedin.com/in/dale-markowitz-40a9a852).

# Â¿QuÃ© aprenderemos?

En este segundo Speedrun aprenderÃ¡s a:
- Entrenar e implementar un modelo de TensorFlow en AI Platform for serving (predicciÃ³n).

- Aprender sobre las APIs de Google Cloud Speech y Cloud Natural Language.

- Extraer entidades y sentimientos de un fragmento de texto mediante Google Cloud Natural Language.

- Realizar transcripciones de voz a texto desde archivos de audio mediante Google Cloud Speech.

# INSCRIPCIÃ“N
Los pasos necesarios para seguir el evento son lo siguientes:

1. RegÃ­strate en los Speedruns en la siguiente URL:
bit.ly/speedrunchallengeeurope

2. En el horario acordado Ãºnete al seminario online y aprende de la mano de un experto de Google!

3. Dentro de la misma semana: completa todos los Qwiklabs para el Speedrun lo mÃ¡s rÃ¡pido posible. Puede probar cada laboratorio hasta 5 veces.

4. RecibirÃ¡s una suscripciÃ³n gratuita de un mes a Qwiklabs.

# REQUISITOS

Ãšnicamente crear una cuenta en Qwiklabs (es completamente gratuita)

---

Hello!

Weâ€™re sure most of you are interested in learning new technologies and tools. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™re excited to participate in the Community Speedrun Challenge that Google is organizing for developer communities in Europe. And as part of the GDGMarbella, youâ€™re among the first to know about this!!

The Community Speedrun Challenge is a training program that will run in May where youâ€™ll have the opportunity to join four Speedruns and get hands-on experience with Machine Learning on Google Cloud, and take your first steps with tools like BigQuery, Cloud Speech API, and Cloud ML Engine. Every Speedrun is open for a week to give you the ability to finish all labs in your best time, scoring more points and winning prizes.

group_profile.intro: GDG Marbella tiene la misiÃ³n de conectar y dinamizar la comunidad de desarrolladores de la zona. Aprender, compartir, crear, conectar ...
